actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution expressing the profound sorrow of the House concerning the death of Representative Torbert H. Macdonald, of Massachusetts.

summary.text: Expresses the condolences of the House of Representatives on the death of the Honorable Torbert H. Macdonald, Representative from the State of Massachusetts. Appoints a committee of 80 Members of the House to attend the funeral.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the profound sorrow of the House concerning the death of Representative Torbert H. Macdonald, of Massachusetts.
